Package app.core.domain.model

Class Date

java.lang.Object
app.core.domain.model.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>, Serializable
Represents a date through the day, month and year.
Author:
Group 40

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date otherDate)
      Compares the date with the other date received by parameter.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      otherDate - the date to compare.
      Returns:
      the value 0 if the received otherDate is equal to the date; the value -1 if the otherDate is later than the date; the value 1 if the otherDate is before the date.

    • difference

      public int difference(int year, int month, int day)
      Returns the difference in number of days between the date and the date received by parameter with year, month and day.
      Parameters:
      year - the year of the date to compare the date to calculate the difference in number of days.
      month - the month of the date to which the date is compared to calculate the difference in number of days.
      day - the day of the date against which the date is compared to calculate the difference in number of days.
      Returns:
      difference in number of days between the date and the date received by parameter with year, month and day.
